about_the_game:
Just hide is an exciting stealth-action game where you can feel like a real secret agent, using your skills and tactical thinking. Your main task is to stay undetected. Each level presents a challenge for your mastery, but the smart use of the environment and various gadgets will help you find a way out of any situation.

The game is inspired by legendary series such as Splinter Cell, Metal Gear Solid, Thief, Deus Ex. Just hide offers a unique combination of adventure stealth-action and 2D platformer.Key Features:

  • Adventure stealth-action with tactical elements
  • Over 30 elaborately designed levels in diverse locations
  • Various types of enemies
  • Numerous ways to outsmart your enemy. Remember, your goal is to remain unnoticed
  • Fascinating dialogues with your partner
  • The game was created by two people who put a lot of love into it
